meanings.definition: The amount of space between two objects or points.
meanings.sent1: The spacings between the chairs in the room were uneven.
meanings.sent2: The spacings of the books on the shelf were neat and organized.
meanings.sent3: The spacings between the trees in the forest seemed to be playing a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The spacings between the stars in the sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The spacings between the clouds made the sky look like a painting.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of objects in relation to each other in terms of space.
meanings.sent1: The spacings of the furniture in the living room made it feel cozy.
meanings.sent2: The spacings of the plants in the garden allowed each to get enough sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The spacings of the toys on the shelf looked like they were having a party.
meanings.sent4: The spacings of the buildings in the city created a unique skyline.
meanings.sent5: The spacings of the planets in the solar system determine their orbits.

meanings.definition: The act of creating or maintaining a specific distance between objects.
meanings.sent1: The spacings of the fence posts were carefully measured to ensure stability.
meanings.sent2: The spacings of the candles on the table were perfect for a romantic dinner.
meanings.sent3: The spacings of the cookies on the baking sheet seemed to be dancing.
meanings.sent4: The spacings of the words on the page made the text easy to read.
meanings.sent5: The spacings of the cars in the parking lot determined the available spots.
